blog.name: wackygoofball
blog.title: The Wacky Goofball
blog.description: Is it madness? Yes, it is. Do I care? Nope.                                             Hiddlestoner, JB-shipper, doing arts to the best of my abilities, analyzing literature with passion, fanfiction is my life, fiction in general is.

summary: Sleepless - Chapter 5 - WackyGoofball - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Sleepless - Chapter 5 - WackyGoofball - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 5/?
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jaime Lannister/Brienne of Tarth
Characters: Jaime Lannister, Brienne of Tarth
Additional Tags: Eventual Romance, Romance, Slow Romance, Canon Compliant, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, well sort of, we don’t know yet how that goes, and the changes are NOT that major so to disrupt the overall plot LOL, Falling In Love, Insomnia, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Mild Hurt/Comfort, with a bit of - Freeform, Trauma, to work through, after all they’ve been through, takes up after Harrenhal, I post this because this keeps staring at me, and I somehow have to get out of the writer’s block, and so I either don#t post at all, or just post the living hell out of me, in the vain hope this will push me, we will have to see, did I forget something?, oh yeah, don’t write fics about sleepless people in the middle of the night, my children, it’s gonna lead to you not getting any rest either, true story, So many tags

Summary:

Through time, Jaime and Brienne spend some many sleepless nights, worrying about one another, longing for the other, and being close to each other.

And over time, the two may have to realize that there is a remedy to their restlessness after all.

… I suck at summaries. Bye.

Chapter Summary:

Jaime has one more gift for Brienne before she departs from King’s Landing to go search for Sansa.

And it seems that he is in for one more gift as well.

However, that doesn’t make saying goodbye any easier for either one of them.

#Thats not my Dany and Jamie

some of you never had to see your favorite character being ruined by bad and inconsistent writing and it shows

title: Sansa
body:
if Sansa ever does wed...
now i know there are many who ship her with Sandor or Petyr, don't worry, i ship her with both of em very much the fucking same.
but lets take a long minute here...
they are both very very verrrry much older then her. (even tho it was in those times - but still)
and she has been hurt is so many physical ways that i just couldn't keep count.

i would love it if she wed's Theon.
now i know they cant reproduce any airs, and whatever. but i honestly feel like Sansa wouldn't give two fucking shits if she had a child or not. 
and they have both known each other basically when they were infants.
and most importantly they love each other, maybe not as the wedding type of way, but they have love.

i would love it if she wed's Theon.
now i know they cant reproduce any airs, and whatever. but i honestly feel like Sansa wouldn't give two fucking shits if she had a child or not.
and they have both known each other basically when they were infants.
and most importantly they love each other, maybe not as the wedding type of way, but they have love.

summary: Spoiler-Tattoo? Sophie Turner trägt jetzt Stark-Wappen
title: Spoiler-Tattoo? Sophie Turner trägt jetzt Stark-Wappen
body:
Noch ist das Ende von „Game of Thrones“ ein Rätsel. Hat Sophie Turner jetzt etwa mit einem Tattoo das Schicksal der Stark-Kinder verraten?

Wer stirbt, wer herrscht? Das epische Finale der achten und letzten Staffel von „Game of Thrones“ ist bis zur Ausstrahlung 2019 das bestgehütete TV-Geheimnis. Nur eins scheint sicher: Nicht alle der geliebten Helden werden das Ende der Kultserie überleben. Seit dem frühen Tod des Patriarchen Eddard Stark (Sean Bean) ist klar, dass selbst die scheinbar wichtigste Figur nicht vor dem Henker sicher ist. Nun hat sich Sophie Turner, Darstellerin von Sansa Stark, ein GoT-Tattoo stechen lassen. Das gibt viel Anlass zu Spekulationen.

„Ausgeplaudert“ wurde das potenzielle Spoiler-Motiv von Lauren Winzer. Die australische Tätowiererin veröffentlichte ein Foto ihrer Arbeit auf Instagram. Das Tattoo zeigt das Siegel des Hauses Stark mit dessen Wappentier, dem Schattenwolf. Darunter steht der Schriftzug „The pack survives.“ (Das Rudel überlebt) – das inoffizielle Motto der Herrscherfamilie des Nordens. So simpel, so unklar. Erwartungsgemäß begann in den Kommentaren auf Instagram ein Wettstreit um die Deutung der Tätowierung.

Wie endet „Game of Thrones“?

Eine Möglichkeit: Die Aussage ist wörtlich gemeint. Damit würden die bislang überlebenden Stark-Sprösslinge Sansa, Arya und Bran sowie eventuell auch Stiefbruder Jon – in Wahrheit aber ihr Cousin – die finale Schlacht um den Eisernen Thron überleben.

Interpretation Nummer zwei: Das Motto ist im übertragenen Sinne zu verstehen. Ed sagt den Satz im ersten Buch der „Das Lied von Eis und Feuer“-Saga von George R. R. Martin: „Wenn der Schnee fällt und die weißen Winde wehen, stirbt der einsame Wolf, doch das Rudel überlebt.“ Dieses Plädoyer für Familienzusammenhalt könnte auch andere Mitstreiter einschließen – allen voran Daenerys Targaryen (Emilia Clarke), die Herrscherin der Sieben Königslande werden will.

Womöglich hat das Tattoo aber eine persönlichere Bedeutung. Eds Zitat fällt in einem Gespräch mit Arya, die gerade mal wieder sauer auf Schwester Sansa ist. Der Vater ermahnt seine Tochter, dass sie und Sansa zusammenhalten müssen und sie ihre Hassgefühle für die wahren Feinde der Starks reservieren soll. Insofern könnte die Tätowierung für Turner eine direkte Erinnerung an die Zeit mit Arya-Darstellerin Maisie Williams sein. Die beiden Britinnen sind gemeinsam bei „Game of Thrones“ erwachsen und enge Freundinnen geworden.

Das Wolf-Zitat wurde jüngst in der siebten Staffel in einem entscheidenden Moment zwischen den Schwestern wiederholt.

Gut möglich ist aber auch, dass die Tätowierung letztlich keine tiefere Botschaft zum Ausgang der Saga transportiert. „Es könnte einfach ein Tattoo sein“, kommentierte ein Instagram-Nutzer den Post. Es hilft alles nichts: Wir müssen uns bis 2019 gedulden.

Bilder: Rex Features, instagram.com/p/BjzNHEIll6g/

summary: La terra è piatta, Dio gioca a pacman con gli aerei e l'Australia non esiste
title: La terra è piatta, Dio gioca a pacman con gli aerei e l'Australia non esiste
body:
La terra è piatta, Dio gioca a pacman con gli aerei e l’Australia non esiste

Ci sono molte occasioni in cui ci si chiede come abbia fatto l’uomo a diventare la specie dominante sul nostro pianeta, e per quanto ancora potremmo mantenere questo status se esistono persone come quelle iscritte alla :

“UNSW Flat Earth Society”

La Flat Earth Society, la più antica associazione di terrapiattisti sul globo, fondata dall’inventore inglese Samuel Birley Rowbotham nel 1800. L’ultima…

blog.name: roses-are-blue16
blog.title: Weird but Unapologetic
blog.description:
Everything is Tagged! Ex:Tv shows, Movies, the punisher, d. grayman, etc...) Made this to just say everything I think or feel without pressure to please anyone 
From: TV shows, Kpop, Anime, Memes, even politics 
If you want to send Asks feel free to do so for anything this can be your place to say what you want too (Keep it classy not vulgar)
Top: Fave Novel/Donghua: Mo Dao Zu Shi Fave Anime/Manga: D. Grayman Fave Tv shows: GoT, The Punisher, Legion. Movie Universe: Marvel Music: Got7/Bts etc....

tags: it may sound stupid but im not a great articulater so idk how to describe how it clicked to me
summary: In regards to Jon Snows origin reveal, am I the only that wasn't looking at the "hint" on the wall behind him back when he was...
body: In regards to Jon Snows origin reveal, am I the only that wasn’t looking at the “hint” on the wall behind him back when he was at Castle Black but automatically thought how it made sense because he was always referred to as “pretty” in the show even if it was meant as an insult. It makes sense Cuz Lyana was constantly mentioned for her beauty as well. To me it clicked into place, because he was especially refered to that during the early seasons and I always thought it was not “odd” but it really stood out to me since it seemed to only occur to him. To me at least it that was a big hint that I never made the connection with until that episode

To me it clicked into place, because he was especially refered to that during the early seasons and I always thought it was not “odd” but it really stood out to me since it seemed to only occur to him. trail.content: In regards to Jon Snows origin reveal, am I the only that wasn’t looking at the “hint” on the wall behind him back when he was at Castle Black but automatically thought how it made sense because he was always referred to as “pretty” in the show even if it was meant as an insult. It makes sense Cuz Lyana was constantly mentioned for her beauty as well. To me it clicked into place, because he was especially refered to that during the early seasons and I always thought it was not “odd” but it really stood out to me since it seemed to only occur to him. To me at least it that was a big hint that I never made the connection with until that episode
